getAnalemma

public static Pts getAnalemma(float time,
                              float lat,
                              float lon,
                              float mer,
                              int nPt,
                              float radius)
compute the analemma at a given position and local time it is the annual path the sun travels at a fixed position and local time. it originates from the fact that the earth travels on an ellipse and that its axis makes an angle with the normal of the ecliptic plane. it makes a figure 8 on the sky http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Analemma

Parameters:
time - local time
lat -
lon -
mer - reference meridian for time zone
nPt - number of points requested (not guaranteed since can be below horizon)
radius -
Returns:
